page.title: 07 A typical day.
page.content: I am ten years old.I live at 23,Heather Drive.This is a typical day of my life. At 7:30 I get out bed,get washed & dre- ssed.I make my bed,open my curtains & go downstairs.For breakfast I have Coco pops & toast.I go to school at 8:35.My 2 friends Robin & David walk to school with me.I arrive at school at 8:50am. At 9:30 we have maths followed by play- time.We continue our lessons with group work.Each group does different things like science,history,topic,English & craft.At 12:00 we have lunch.We then have more work and assembly.At 3:45 we go home.When I get home I play with my friend Richard,in our garden.When my dad gets home I have tea.At 6:30 I go to cubs.I am a sixer there.After cubs I change into some other clothes & go to my piano lesson,which is from 8:30 to 9:00.I get back from my piano lesson at 9:05.I then go to bed.
